text: I'm in the bustling Pratunam area of
Bangkok about to go to a restaurant that
serves common guy the Thai style of
chicken rice the restaurant I'm going to
is called guide on katana a bangkok
street stall eatery that has been around
for a long time and has accumulated a
fair share of hungry local fans that
dine in or take out common guy is
actually a really simple dish the
plumpest chickens are boiled whole
sliced with precision into bite-sized
pieces and served over rice the rice is
not just ordinary white rice it's cooked
with the chicken broth and fat so it's
slightly oily with a wonderful essence
of chicken a few slices of chicken are
placed on top of a portion of rice along
with a few cucumber slices a side bowl
of chicken soup and a sweet sour and
salty sauce this is a restaurant known
for its common guy which is just boiled
chicken
boiled chicken with the chicken and it's
a very simple dish very easy and
hopefully it tastes pretty good but the
important thing is the sauce the sauce
will actually make or break this dish so
you just put some sauce on the rice grab
a bit of the chicken
pretty good
this is not what I would call on a pilot
but it is very comforting and
or some plane plane or typhoon all right
so after tasting this be honest I'll
have to say it's not my favorite dish
it's alright but common guy is common
guy it's rice and chicken so if you're a
big fan of rice and chicken definitely
like this but the good thing about this
restaurant is they serve you a fateful
soup
with a bunch of chicken bones and they
have little bits of meat better
can suck the chicken up and it's pretty
good
common guy is not a dish I eat often
because Thailand just has so many other
vibrantly flavorful dishes that need to
be eaten but once in a while a plate of
Thai chicken rice is soothing and
playing comforting on the stomach thanks
for watching this video and be sure to
check out eating Thai food comm by
